titles.title: Begin My Tongue Some Heavenly Theme

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Begin my tongue some heav'nly theme
And speak some boundless thing;

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The mighty works or mightier name,
Of our eternal King.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Tell of His wondrous faithfulness
And sound His pow'r abroad;

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Sing the sweet promise of His grace,
The love and truth of God.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
His very word of grace is strong,
As that which built the skies;

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
The voice that roles the stars along,
Speaks all the promises.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
O might I hear Thy heav'nly tongue,
But whisper Thou art mine;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Those gentle words shall raise my song,
To notes almost divine.
